subject: AM Brief: Fri, 30 Jun 2023
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-off. Base metals were volatile amid concerns over Czech Koruna.

**Key Event Today:** China PMI at 10:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Gibson, Erdman and Cummerata upgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Voluptates curtus tumultus tot abeo vilicus nam vereor.
- AFR: Ab confero illo demitto tutis curo.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Auto Reply: Out of Office
body:
Thank you for your email.

--
This is an automated response.

I am out of the office on annual leave from Mon Sep 08 2025 07:49:05 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) to Sun Oct 05 2025 09:34:15 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) with no email access. For urgent matters, please contact Thomas Francis at thomas.francis@jpmorgan.com.

Otherwise, I will respond to your email upon my return.

Thank you.
